tags.name: Admin Dashboard
tags.description: Admin dashboard statistics and analytics APIs

put.description: Dành cho các user mới đăng nhập lần đầu

get.summary: Get registered districts for current partner

put.description: Replace all registered districts with new list
Cancel ≥ 4h before start: no penalty. Cancel < 4h: 30% penalty split among claimed partners. Disallowed if any partner is working.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific user

put.description: Admin can update user profile information
Admin can activate or deactivate user account

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific service catalog

put.description: Admin can update service catalog information
Admin can update partner availability status
Admin can manage partner's working districts
Admin can update booking status with optional reason
Admin can cancel booking with full refund to customer

post.summary: Create review for partner (must be completed booking)

post.description: Partner starts working on a claimed booking
Partner cancels their claim. Cancel ≥ 4h before start: no penalty. Cancel < 4h: 30% penalty applied to partner. Disallowed if partner is already working.
Partner scans QR code and starts booking. QR token must be valid and not expired. Partner must have claimed the booking.
Customer can choose to cancel (full refund) or continue (cost split among available partners) when booking has insufficient partners within 6 hours of start time.

Default OTP: 123456, Phone number lấy lại phone ở hàm send OTP, Role nếu là app cho người dùng thì là CUSTOMER còn app cho partner thì là PARTNER
Response trả về accessToken và các biến isNewUser để check và xác định màn hình tiếp theo
Nếu là new user sẽ có trả thêm user id để tiện sử dụng update thông tin
Hàm này dùng để login hoặc register khi call sẽ send otp nhưng hiện tại sẽ không gửi mà dùng otp: 123456

get.description: Public endpoint to get all districts for selection
Customer generates QR code token for booking. Token is valid for 1 hour. Only available for FULLY_ACCEPTED or PARTIALLY_ACCEPTED (with customer accepted) bookings.

isCustomerAccepted.description:
Indicates whether the customer has accepted the booking.
    This field is only applicable when the booking status is PARTIALLY_ACCEPTED.
